name: Musosoup
slogan: Helping musicians generate great press for their releases
description: Musosoup connects musicians with music bloggers. We help musicians to generate PR for album, single or video releases, and we help music bloggers to discover and write about great new music.

jobs.title: Cofounder - Front End Dev (sweat equity)
jobs.description:
Looking for a front-end developer with a keen eye for design to join as a co-founder of an early-stage startup operating in the music and media space. This position is currently for people who can dedicate sweat-equity. 

We are revenue-generating and have a solid and growing user base. The confounding team consists of three individuals, including a back-end developer,  owner of a London-based promotions company and owner of a business development firm,  who have completely bootstrapped the platform from the ground up, working outside our usual work hours to get it to where it is. 

We’re now looking to create an amazing front-end, and as this is such a core part of product we feel we are missing someone who can come on board as a co-founder, complement the skills of our back-end developer cofounder and drive the front-end vision and delivery. 

As a cofounder, you will receive equity and become an influential part of a business that looks to disrupt a very specific area of the music and media industries. 

We don’t take ourselves too seriously and like to have fun whilst solving real problems. We are looking for someone who shares our vision, who can dedicate some time to this project and can meet weekly (out of normal working hours). 

So, if you have great front-end developer skills,  have some spare time, and want a new and potentially lucrative challenges please get in contact. 

As you will be creating a new front end from scratch (replacing our existing bootstrap theme) we are pretty open to working with whatever technology you specialise in, as long it’s fit for purpose. 

We look forward to hearing from you!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Looking for a front-end developer with a keen eye for design to join as a co-founder of an early-stage startup operating in the music and media space. This position is currently for people who can dedicate sweat-equity.

We are revenue-generating and have a solid and growing user base. The confounding team consists of three individuals, including a back-end developer, owner of a London-based promotions company and owner of a business development firm, who have completely bootstrapped the platform from the ground up, working outside our usual work hours to get it to where it is.

We’re now looking to create an amazing front-end, and as this is such a core part of product we feel we are missing someone who can come on board as a co-founder, complement the skills of our back-end developer cofounder and drive the front-end vision and delivery.

As a cofounder, you will receive equity and become an influential part of a business that looks to disrupt a very specific area of the music and media industries.

We don’t take ourselves too seriously and like to have fun whilst solving real problems. We are looking for someone who shares our vision, who can dedicate some time to this project and can meet weekly (out of normal working hours).

So, if you have great front-end developer skills, have some spare time, and want a new and potentially lucrative challenges please get in contact.

As you will be creating a new front end from scratch (replacing our existing bootstrap theme) we are pretty open to working with whatever technology you specialise in, as long it’s fit for purpose.

We look forward to hearing from you!
